title: Toro Ironworks Kitchen & Bar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Mexican, Catering, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A casual Mexican restaurant offers vegetarian and vegan choices such as potatoes, beans, hummus a la mexicano, sauteed mushrooms with poblano, the polskie quesadilla, black bean hummus, and jackfruit (served predominantly as a taco). Owner is happy to welcome vegans and vegetarians and is adding more options as time goes by.
